name: rinse
content:
rinse verb [I or T]
(CLEAN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use water to clean the soap or dirt from something: First apply shampoo to hair and then rinse thoroughly. There was no soap, so I just rinsed my hands with water.

Phrasal verb
rinse something out
[ C ] the process of using water to get rid of soap or dirt: He gave the soapy dishes a rinse. She gave the dirty towel a quick rinse.
[ C or U ] a substance that gives a temporary colour to the hair: My grandmother had a blue rinse every month.
